ingredients: LA Note: I used 10 rolls for one pan full and cut everything in half since I was only making one pan.
¼ cup butter or margarine — melted
½ cup sweetened dried cranberries — (such as Craisins)
OR ½ cup dried apricots — chopped
⅔ cup ⅓-less-fat cream cheese — (6 ounces) softened (I would use the whole 8 ounces)
